nearbyMap - Static variable in class squidpony.performance.DijkstraBenchmark
 
neighbors - Variable in class squidpony.performance.alternate.CustomDijkstraMap
The neighbors map, as produced by adjacency; can be modified by passing neighbors as the first argument to Adjacency.portal(int[][][], int, int, boolean) if you want to create portals between non-adjacent cells.
neighbors - Variable in class squidpony.performance.alternate.OldCustomDijkstraMap
The neighbors map, as produced by adjacency; can be modified by passing neighbors as the first argument to Adjacency.portal(int[][][], int, int, boolean) if you want to create portals between non-adjacent cells.
NextDijkstraMap - Class in squidpony.performance.alternate
An alternative to AStarSearch when you want to fully explore a search space, or when you want a gradient floodfill.

NextDijkstraMap(char[][]) - Constructor for class squidpony.performance.alternate.NextDijkstraMap
Constructor meant to take a char[][] returned by DungeonBoneGen.generate(), or any other char[][] where '#' means a wall and anything else is a walkable tile.
NextDijkstraMap(char[][], RNG) - Constructor for class squidpony.performance.alternate.NextDijkstraMap
Constructor meant to take a char[][] returned by DungeonBoneGen.generate(), or any other char[][] where '#' means a wall and anything else is a walkable tile.
NextDijkstraMap(char[][], char) - Constructor for class squidpony.performance.alternate.NextDijkstraMap
Constructor meant to take a char[][] returned by DungeonBoneGen.generate(), or any other char[][] where one char means a wall and anything else is a walkable tile.

Constructor meant to take a char[][] returned by DungeonBoneGen.generate(), or any other char[][] where '#' means a wall and anything else is a walkable tile.

NextDijkstraMap.Measurement - Enum in squidpony.performance.alternate
The type of heuristic to use.
